blog_list.desc: Video games have always been seen as a hobby for the young – a thing we grow out of as we accumulate more responsibilities.According to the cliche, the average family home contains two parents reading quietly at the kitchen table while their children zone out in front of the living room TV, controllers in hand, screaming at their friends through headsets.

blog_list.title: STEPS TO PROTECTING …
blog_list.desc: Just like online gamers, Steam users often overlook account safety. Gamers build their accounts from scratch, buying and earning rewards and games and gaining invaluable friendships along the way. But it can all go away if you don’t secure your account. New risks emerge regularly. Hackers forcefully steal your accounts with various dirty tactics. Here are some steps to protecting your Steam account & online gaming.
